<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108169</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108169</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765086007</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Teaching the features of effective writing</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterrichten der Merkmale des wirkungsvollen 
Schreibens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Enseignement des dispositifs de l'écriture 
pertinente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ensinando as características da escrita eficaz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Istruzione delle caratteristiche di scrittura 
efficace</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διδασκαλία των χαρακτηριστικών γνωρισμάτων του 
αποτελεσματικού γραψίματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Enseñanza de las características de la escritura 
eficaz</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">By organizing your instruction around focus, organization, support and elaboration, style, and conventions, you can help students become more effective writers and make your own job easier.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Indem sie Ihre Anweisung um Fokus organisiert, 
unterstützen Organisation, und Ausarbeitung, Art und Versammlungen, 
können Sie Kursteilnehmern helfen, wirkungsvollere Verfasser zu 
werden und Ihren eigenen Job einfacher zu bilden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En organisant votre instruction autour de foyer, 
l'organisation, supportent et élaboration, modèle, et conventions, 
vous pouvez aider des étudiants à devenir des auteurs plus 
pertinents et à faciliter votre propre travail.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Organizando sua instrução em torno do foco, a 
organização, suporta e elaboration, estilo, e convenções, você 
pode ajudar a estudantes transformar-se uns escritores mais eficazes e
fazer seu próprio trabalho mais fácil.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Organizzando la vostra istruzione intorno al 
fuoco, l'organizzazione, sostiene ed elaborazione, stile e 
convenzioni, potete aiutare gli allievi a diventare produttori più 
efficaci ed a rendere il vostro proprio lavoro più facile.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Με την οργάνωση της οδηγίας σας γύρω από την εστίαση,
της οργάνωσης, της υποστήριξης και της επεξεργασίας, του ύφους, 
και των συμβάσεων, μπορείτε να βοηθήσετε τους σπουδαστές να 
γίνουν αποτελεσματικότεροι συγγραφείς και να καταστήσουν την 
εργασία σας ευκολότερη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ordenando su instrucción alrededor del foco, la 
organización, utiliza y elaboración, estilo, y las convenciones, 
usted puede ayudar a estudiantes a hacer programas de escritura más 
eficaces y a hacer su propio trabajo más fácil.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>

              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD

END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>

        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>

        </educational>
        <rights>

            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>

          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>

    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
